Requesting client reviews is one of the best ways to showcase your professional services for future clients.  Don’t worry – we only permit reviews from actual clients.
Any lawyer with a verified Justia Profile can leave you a review if they are familiar with your work. Requesting these reviews is easy with a simple email invite.
